dublin_core.dcvalue: The new information and communication technologies telematics such as the Internet telephone services and videoconferencing are simultaneously both an instrument and a symbol a sign of progress but also a potential addiction problem Sensitive topics like substances or mental health bring out all these characteristics of telematics Therefore the computer world substances and addictions are closely connected
Made available in DSpace on 2020-02-12T11:31:02Z (GMT). No. of bitstreams: 0 Previous issue date: 2005-03-07
Studies in health technology and informatics
Experiences and perspectives in using telematic prevention on sensitive health issues.
